str2: And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The greatest, the most, very great. Irregular superlative of polus; the largest number or very large.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A primary preposition and adverb; properly, up; but used severally, or at.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To translate, interpret, explain. From dia and hermeneuo; to explain thoroughly, by implication, to translate.
